summary: Elseryl Has lost her Dagger. Can you retrieve it? (My first quest mod)
descriptionHtml:
[size=28] Elseryls Final Loss [/size]

[size=3]This is my first, and maybe last quest mod, as I\\\'m a lot better at player abodes, decorating etc.
So this quest is based on a family that were recently robbed. You go Whiterun\\\'s bannered mare, and notice a Unhappy Dark Elf Male in there. You talk to him, he asks you a favour, you either accept the favour or deny it. When accepted and finished, he will ask you a new favour to help his robbed family. There are various quests in, and 5 new NPCS. They are NOT voice acted, if anyone would like to voice act any characters, PM Me! [/size]

Installation :

A Rather simple installation, [i]Drag and drop ESM file to /Skyrim/Data[/i] Folder.
author: Elseryl
